Html:
Is it possible to get Two Way binding without NotifyPropertyChanged?

We have a test ViewModel that defines a standard public string property. In our XAML we have it bound to a Text control with Mode=TwoWay... We are not hitting breakpoints in the setter/getter, but we are getting the values updated to the ViewModel.

Please comment on this topic.

Hi,

I believe you could find the following threads from the WPF forums interesting, where similar discussions are addressed:

  • Binding - PropertyDescriptor / INotifyPropertyChanged / DependencyProperty
  • Data binding without INotifyPropertyChanged

I hope you find this handy,

Agustin Adami
http://blogs.southworks.net/aadami
